body:
So I think the interviews are over now? Tell me if I'm wrong. But just wanted to congratulate everyone who got it, particularly happy for calliex11, CrafterPete1013 and Evocal. Since the mod applications as well, it feels as if we are a happier community and I think more people are joining as well! This is great for Avicus, as we were in a right downer. Let's hope everything picks up.

iBiZa
